item.title: Daily Harvest Review: Good Meals for Single Vegans Who Don’t Mind Mush
item.description: These vegan, gluten-free delivery meals take the work out of meal prep, although the food can be a little boring (and mushy).

item.title: Ford Maverick Hybrid AWD 2025: prices, specs availability, review
item.description: The new four-wheel-drive electrified pickup has arrived, and it's better than ever. There's just one snag. It's made in Mexico.

item.title: Adidas Promo Codes & Deals: 30% Off
item.description: Save up to 30% with our Adidas coupon and join the adiClub to enjoy great benefits, like 15% off, plus other member-exclusive deals.

item.title: Scientists Claim to Have Brought Back the Dire Wolf
item.description: Startup Colossal Biosciences has edited the DNA of a gray wolf to produce what it says is a de-extincted animal. Does that make it a true dire wolf?

item.title: SteelSeries Apex Pro Mini Gen 3: A Hall Effect 60% Keyboard
item.description: This could’ve been the apex of compact gaming keyboards, but it has a few too many flaws and a high price.
